FuncDef:
The application command installs an application in the open application system and displays the application view, or directly displays an existing application view.
The undo application command uninstalls an application from the open application system. The application command installs an application in the open application system and displays the application view, or directly displays an existing application view. The undo application command uninstalls an application from the open application system. By default, no application is installed in the open application system.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an application.
The value is a string of 2 to 63 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

Specifies the name of a configuration file.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters without space.

ExtraInfo: During application installation, you can configure applications in either of the following ways:
